Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @Vortex, looks like you made a decision
@channel, Vortex stays with us!
I think he deserves a pardon for all of his previous misconducts
So, Jenkins, I assume now you can prepare us a fresh .exe file with unstopable power of breaking EnSec
On it, sir
In the mean time, let me explain to all of you what is our mission's goal
I managed to scout EnTech for a bit, and found some really messy vulnerabilities
So that's how I got EnSec breaker, or EnBreak
Somewhere there as well should be whitelist files that we need
You have to scan everything around there and find these specific files: Token file, SecCore.dll, and any dump files you can find
EnBreak.exe is ready
Great
Now, upload it onto this server so everybody can have it
Done
While you have that .exe, it will be automaticly run when you connect to the EnSec protected server
Note, that it won't react to the older versions, so it is not universal
Now, I hope Jenkins extracted our entry point
Once you have EnBreak.exe on your computer, try to get access to EnTech network and get me specific files
I'll leave a note if you forget
!ATTACHMENT:note#%#File Names#%#Token file,SecCore.dll,any dump files
Upload them on this server's /home folder, so I could get them
Got it. Well Jenkins, where is our entry point?
Looking for it
@Vortex, on Omicron's request, you will lead the operation
I know that our relations are at a very fragile state now
But let's see this through a business point of perspective
You will get tools to fight Omicron, we will get tools for our future business
Win-win situation
Prophet will assist you with any portbraeking issues you could possibly have, he has personal tool collection
I can spectate you through .dll that you dropped us, so if there is any problem with ports, I will help
Here is the entry point
!ATTACHMENT:link#%#EnTech Side Server#%#27.113.216.249
